Sentencas: Synthesis conditions of La2Mo2O9 thin film by radio frequency (RF) sputtering technique on Al2O3 ceramic substrates are studied.
Titulo: Growth of La2Mo2O9 filins on porous Al2O3 substrates by radio frequency magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: It is found that the deposition temperature and oxygen partial pressure are the most important factors for obtaining pure La2Mo2O9 films.
Titulo: Growth of La2Mo2O9 filins on porous Al2O3 substrates by radio frequency magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: Varying both parameters, Mo-rich, stoichiometric, and Mo-deficient films are obtained.
Titulo: Growth of La2Mo2O9 filins on porous Al2O3 substrates by radio frequency magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: With increasing the La:Mo ratio, films become denser.
Titulo: Growth of La2Mo2O9 filins on porous Al2O3 substrates by radio frequency magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: A crust layer is observed on top of the Mo-rich and the Mo-deficient films.
Titulo: Growth of La2Mo2O9 filins on porous Al2O3 substrates by radio frequency magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: The formation of the La2Mo2O9 phase is discussed with respect to the sputtering mechanism.
Titulo: Growth of La2Mo2O9 filins on porous Al2O3 substrates by radio frequency magnetron sputtering
Growth of La2Mo2O9 filins on porous Al2O3 substrates by radio frequency magnetron sputtering
Growth of La2Mo2O9 filins on porous Al2O3 substrates by radio frequency magnetron sputtering
